text.section: The Department may adopt regulations which designate an area as a harvest reserve area for oysters.

section.section:
An action of the Department under subsection (b) of this section may not become effective until:
A copy of the notice to be published under item (ii) of this paragraph has been delivered to the Joint Committee on Administrative, Executive, and Legislative Review; and
48 hours after notice has been published:
The notice required under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall state all applicable reasons for the Department's action.
